item.title: Inside the Biden Administration’s Unpublished Report on AI Safety
item.description: The US government conducted a groundbreaking study on frontier models—and never published the results.

item.title: I Watched AI Agents Try to Hack My Vibe-Coded Websit
item.description: RunSybil, a startup founded by OpenAI’s first security researcher, deploys agents that probe websites for vulnerabilities—part of a new AI era for cybersecurity.

item.title: Former Top Google Researchers Have Made A New Kind of AI Agent
item.description: The mission? Teaching models to better understand how to build code will lead to superintelligent AI.
